title: Hoang Anh Gia Lai FC
text:
Hoang Anh Gia Lai Football Club (), simply known as Hoang Anh Gia Lai and commonly known as HAGL, is a Vietnamese professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Pleiku">Pleiku</a>, <a href="Gia%20Lai">Gia Lai</a>. Owned by Đoàn Nguyên Đức, a prominent Vietnamese businessman and founder of <a href="Hoang%20Anh%20Gia%20Lai%20Group">Hoang Anh Gia Lai Group</a>, They play in the top division in Vietnamese soccer, <a href="V.League%201">V.League 1</a>. Their home stadium is <a href="Pleiku%20Stadium">Pleiku Stadium</a>.
On 11 April 2019, HAGL partnered up with <a href="Feyenoord%20Rotterdam">Feyenoord Rotterdam</a> to a talent and coaching development partnership. The aim of this was for Feyenoord to share its knowhow and methodology with HAGL. With this partnership, Vietnamese teams, players and coaches will be able to travel to the <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a> to gain experience.
